targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    DATE(start_date) AS "time",
    SUM(elapsed_time) / 3600 AS duration_hours_per_day
FROM stravaapp.Activity
WHERE 
    ("${sport_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR sport_type IN (${sport_type:sqlstring})) AND
    ("${regular_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR type IN (${regular_type:sqlstring})) AND
    ("${workout_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR workout_type IN (
            CASE
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Long run%" THEN 2
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Race%" THEN 1
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Workout%" THEN 3
                ELSE NULL
            END
        ) OR workout_type IN (
            CASE
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Race%" THEN 11
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Workout%" THEN 12
                ELSE NULL
            END
        )
    ) AND
    elapsed_time > 0
GROUP BY DATE(start_date)
ORDER BY DATE(start_date);

SELECT
COUNT(calories)
FROM stravaapp.Activity
WHERE 
("${sport_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR sport_type IN (${sport_type:sqlstring})) AND
("${regular_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR type IN (${regular_type:sqlstring})) AND
("${workout_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR workout_type IN (
            CASE
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Long run%" THEN 2
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Race%" THEN 1
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Workout%" THEN 3
                ELSE NULL
            END
        ) OR workout_type IN (
            CASE
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Race%" THEN 11
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Workout%" THEN 12
                ELSE NULL
            END
        )
    ) AND
start_date BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000) AND
calories > 0

SELECT
    AVG(elapsed_time) / 3600 AS avg_duration_hours
FROM stravaapp.Activity
WHERE 
    ("${sport_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR sport_type IN (${sport_type:sqlstring})) AND
    ("${regular_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR type IN (${regular_type:sqlstring})) AND

        ) OR workout_type IN (
            CASE
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Race%" THEN 11
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Workout%" THEN 12
                ELSE NULL
            END
        )
    ) AND
    start_date BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000) AND
    elapsed_time > 0

                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Workout%" THEN 12

calories > 0

SELECT
MIN(calories) as min,
MAX(calories) as max,
AVG(calories) as avg
FROM stravaapp.Activity
WHERE 
("${sport_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR sport_type IN (${sport_type:sqlstring})) AND
("${regular_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR type IN (${regular_type:sqlstring})) AND
("${workout_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR workout_type IN (

                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Long run%" THEN 2

start_date BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000) AND
calories > 0

SELECT 
    start_date AS "time",
    calories / (elapsed_time / 3600) AS calories_per_hour
FROM stravaapp.Activity
WHERE 
    ("${sport_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR sport_type IN (${sport_type:sqlstring})) AND
    ("${regular_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR type IN (${regular_type:sqlstring})) AND
    ("${workout_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR workout_type IN (
            CASE
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Long run%" THEN 2
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Race%" THEN 1
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Workout%" THEN 3
                ELSE NULL
            END
        ) OR workout_type IN (
            CASE
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Race%" THEN 11
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Workout%" THEN 12
                ELSE NULL
            END
        )
    ) AND
    calories > 0 AND
    elapsed_time > 0

SELECT
    SUM(calories) / (SUM(elapsed_time) / 3600) AS avg_calories_per_hour
FROM stravaapp.Activity
WHERE 
    ("${sport_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR sport_type IN (${sport_type:sqlstring})) AND
    ("${regular_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR type IN (${regular_type:sqlstring})) AND
    ("${workout_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR workout_type IN (
            CASE
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Long run%" THEN 2

    start_date BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000) AND
    calories > 0 AND
    elapsed_time > 0

SELECT
    MIN(calories / (elapsed_time / 3600)) AS min,
    MAX(calories / (elapsed_time / 3600)) AS max,
    SUM(calories) / (SUM(elapsed_time) / 3600) AS avg
FROM stravaapp.Activity
WHERE 
    ("${sport_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR sport_type IN (${sport_type:sqlstring})) AND
    ("${regular_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR type IN (${regular_type:sqlstring})) AND
    ("${workout_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR workout_type IN (
            CASE
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Long run%" THEN 2
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Race%" THEN 1
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Workout%" THEN 3
                ELSE NULL
            END
        ) OR workout_type IN (
            CASE
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Race%" THEN 11
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Workout%" THEN 12
                ELSE NULL
            END
        )
    ) AND
    start_date BETWEEN FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000) AND
    calories > 0 AND
    elapsed_time > 0

SELECT 
    sport_type, 
    SUM(calories) AS total_calories
FROM stravaapp.Activity
WHERE 
    ("${sport_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR sport_type IN (${sport_type:sqlstring})) AND
    ("${regular_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR type IN (${regular_type:sqlstring})) AND
    ("${workout_type:csv_string}" = "'All'" OR workout_type IN (
            CASE

                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Race%" THEN 1
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Workout%" THEN 3

            END
        ) OR workout_type IN (
            CASE
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Race%" THEN 11
                WHEN "${workout_type:csv_string}" LIKE "%Workout%" THEN 12
                ELSE NULL

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    CASE 
        WHEN workout_type = 2 THEN 'Long run'
        WHEN workout_type IN (1,11) THEN 'Race'
        WHEN workout_type IN (12, 3) THEN 'Workout'
        ELSE 'Other' 
    END AS workout_type_label
FROM Activity 
WHERE workout_type IS NOT NULL 
  AND workout_type NOT IN (10, 0);
list.label: Workout type
list.name: workout_type
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    CASE 
        WHEN workout_type = 2 THEN 'Long run'
        WHEN workout_type IN (1,11) THEN 'Race'
        WHEN workout_type IN (12, 3) THEN 'Workout'
        ELSE 'Other' 
    END AS workout_type_label
FROM Activity 
WHERE workout_type IS NOT NULL 
  AND workout_type NOT IN (10, 0);
